name: BLUE SHARK
description:
Oversize design featuring a cheeky little shark and the lyric 'Take a running jump!'

These were screen-printed on Gildan Heavy Tees and look awesome on both ladies and gents!

Size chart:

SMALL - 46" WIDTH 71" LENGTH
MEDIUM -	51" WIDTH 74" LENGTH
LARGE - 56" WIDTH 76" LENGTH *sold out*

Designed by It was a wolf

name: With a Breath & a Hope - Handmade Limited & Numbered CD
description:
An incredibly rare physical version of our new mini-album 'With a Breath & a Hope', handmade by our very own Laurie (vocals/guitar), with artwork by the incredible Claire Alex Andrews (it was a wolf) and numbered, for extra exclusivity!

WAB&AH features the songs:

How many times man I'm not caesar
Eleanor
Baby you be the architect
Who's game for another one line adventure?
We will sink your battleship
Face it kid you can't build a bridge out of algebra

WAB&AH was recorded by Matt O'Grady at his house in Surrey, England. All music and vocals were written and performed by Hold The Fight. All lyrics were written by L. Cottingham. All copy rights are reserved by the members of Hold The Fight.

name: WHITE 'BE YOURSELF' *size small only*
description:
Oversize design printed on Gildan Heavy-style tees - looks awesome and fits like a glove on both the ladies & the gents!

*Available in Small only* 





Artwork/design by:
CLAIRE ALEX ANDREWS: itwasawolf.tumblr.com

HTF logo by:
TOMMY BRABHAM

name: LIMITED HAND-MADE DEMO EP
description:
An incredibly rare, handmade (by Laurie HTF), physical version of our debut demo EP featuring the songs 'Hey Alaska let's be lovers', 'Who taught you to dance like that', You're gonna need subtitles' and 'Just so you know I lost my balance'.

Rarer than an undercooked turkey at christmas, get one before they're all gone!!!!
